long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
demoshake’s Chrome Extension lets you quickly make, share, and embed interactive product demos and walkthroughs.

Simply put, demoshake helps companies create interactive product demos, guide their sales teams during calls, and keep every demo up to company standards.

Two main issues for sales reps are delivering a great demo and staying up-to-date with the latest features. We've built a browser extension that makes creating interactive demos as easy as clicking a button.

Once the demo is recorded, it’s easy to edit and personalize details like names, emails, logos, images, colors, and company names - no tech skills needed! These demos can be shared directly or integrated into our real-time call assistant, Blueprints.

With Blueprints, our step-by-step guide feature, you can set up custom demo guides based on what each customer wants to see and share them with the entire sales team. This way, every rep can highlight the features that matter most to each prospect.
